PerfectNetExp.abs: 各种蔬菜的英语翻译|各类常用英语词汇 ... caper 刺山柑,老鼠瓜 cardoon 刺菜蓟 chervil 雪维菜,细叶芹.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(C1)_fang_新浪博客 ... cardo 轴节 cardoon 刺棘蓟 cardplayer 玩牌的人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French cardon, from carde 'edible part of an artichoke', from modern Provençal cardo, based on Latin carduus, cardus 'thistle, artichoke'

means.word_mean: 1. southern European plant having spiny leaves and purple flowers cultivated for its edible leafstalks and roots
2. only parts eaten are roots and especially stalks (blanched and used as celery); related to artichokes

auth_sentence.content: Large, structural, silvery plants like globe artichoke or cardoon make good backgrounds for the back of a border.
auth_sentence.res_content: Large, structural, silvery plants like globe artichoke or cardoon make good backgrounds for the back of a border.
